IISc is the premier research insti in India.

-Guide: Dr. L.Umanand, Department of Electronic System Engineering, Indian Institute of Science, Bangalore

-Developed prototype for simulation of engineering systems in Matlab after learning about the tradeo s between feasible programming languages(Matlab, Julia, and Python) and Automata Theor

-Involved the implementation of Regular Expressions to accomplish retrieval of function parameters of le to be simulated. Prototype developed is currently being used by the people in the Power Electronics lab for their simulations.

-Concepts and Tools: Automata, Simulation of Engineering Systems, Matlab, Julia
